translation.mensagemSucesso: Your report was sent successfully! We will continue to inform you by email
translation.objetoDescricao: What does the object look like?
translation.objetoTextoIdentificacao: The more details you provide, the easier it will be to identify the object and return it to you
translation.objetoTextoDetalhes: Any more details to help identify the lost object?
translation.disclaimerText1: If you haven't found your item in your search, don't lose hope. It may not have been delivered to the Lost and Found department yet.
translation.disclaimerText2: You can report your loss and if someone delivers your item, we will notify you immediately.
translation.signIn: Don't have an account yet? Sign in!
translation.iChei: Lost something? iChei! Find what's yours with one touch.
translation.linkRecuperacao: Recovery link was sent to the following email address:
translation.instrucaoRecuperacaoEmail: Write the email used in your registration. We will send you a link for changing your password
